QuestData.Title: On the Brink
QuestData.Description: This many withered threaten to wipe our brood out completely!$b$bQuickly, $n! Crack off a ley crystal and heal any wounded drakes you can find out on the battlefield.$b$bI will do what I can to keep these whelplings safe and healthy.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Radiant Ley Crystal or your healing spells and abilities to resuscitate wounded dragons.
QuestData.RewardText: Well done. I saw the other drakes take to the skies.$b$bAnd look! You found Emmigosa!$b$bIt seems she's taken a shine to you, $n. I trust you'll keep her safe for now.
